presentationColumns.name: Requisition Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of quantity at distribution level and excludes reinstate, split and replaced line status.

presentationColumns.name: Requisition Primary Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of quantity at distribution level and excludes reinstate, split and replaced line status. This shows quantity in primary UOM.

presentationColumns.name: Requisition Line Count
presentationColumns.description: Count of requisition lines excluding reinstate, split and replaced line status.

presentationColumns.name: Rejected Requisition Count
presentationColumns.description: Count of distinct requisition with status rejected status.

presentationColumns.name: Rejected Requisition Lines Count
presentationColumns.description: Count of requisition lines with rejected status and excludes reinstate, split and replaced line status.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Requisitions.Rejected Requisition Lines Count

presentationColumns.name: Pending Approval Requisition Lines Count
presentationColumns.description: Count of requisition lines with pending approval status and excludes reinstate, split and replaced line status.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Requisitions.Pending Approval Requisition Lines Count

presentationColumns.name: Unprocessed Requisition Lines Count
presentationColumns.description: Count of requisition lines which are yet to get converted to purchase order or purchase order header without processed date (version 0). This metrics excludes internal requisition and reinstate, split and replaced line status.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Requisitions.Unprocessed Requisition Lines Count

presentationColumns.name: Approved Requisition Lines Count
presentationColumns.description: Count of requisition lines with approved status and excludes reinstate, split and replaced line status.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Requisitions.Approved Requisition Lines Count

presentationColumns.name: Processed Requisition Lines Count
presentationColumns.description: Count of requisition lines which got converted to purchase order and purchase order header having processed date (version 0). This metrics excludes internal requisition and reinstate, split and replaced line status.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Requisitions.Processed Requisition Lines Count

presentationColumns.name: Unfulfilled Requisition Lines Count
presentationColumns.description: Count of requisition lines for which purchase order got processed and  has purchase order line fulfilled flag value as N. This metrics excludes internal requisition and reinstate, split and replaced line status.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Requisitions.Unfulfilled Requisition Lines Count

presentationColumns.name: Fulfilled Requisition Lines Count
presentationColumns.description: Count of requisition lines for which purchase order got processed and has purchase order line fulfilled flag value as Y.  Purchase order line fulfilled flag will have value as Y only when all the schedule lines for that purchase order line is closed for receiving or invoicing. And fulfilled date is maximum of the schedule receipt dates or invoice dates. This metrics excludes internal requisition and reinstate, split and replaced line status.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Requisitions.Fulfilled Requisition Lines Count

presentationColumns.name: Requisition Approval Cycle Time Days
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as average difference between requisition approval date and requisition submitted date for version zero.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Requisitions.Requisition Approval Cycle Time Days

presentationColumns.name: PR to PO Cycle Time
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as average difference between purchase order creation date and requisition line approval date. This metrics excludes internal requisition and reinstate, split and replaced line status.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Requisitions.PR to PO Cycle Time

presentationColumns.name: Fulfilled Cycle Time Days
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as average difference between purchase order line fulfill date and requisition line last submitted date. And fulfilled date is maximum of the schedule receipt dates or invoice dates. This metrics excludes internal requisition and reinstate, split and replaced line status.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Requisitions.Fulfilled Cycle Time Days

presentationColumns.name: Requisition Approval to PO Fulfillment Time
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as average difference between purchase order line fulfill date and requisition line last approval date. And fulfilled date is maximum of the schedule receipt dates or invoice dates. This metrics excludes internal requisition and reinstate, split and replaced line status.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Requisitions.Requisition Approval to PO Fulfillment Time

localization.localizationKey: Requisition Approval to PO Fulfillment Time

presentationColumns.name: Unprocessed Average Aging Days
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as average difference between system date and requisition line last approval date for requisition lines which are yet to get converted to purchase order or purchase order header without processed date (version 0). This metrics excludes internal requisition and reinstate, split and replaced line status.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Requisitions.Unprocessed Average Aging Days
